name: Cross Country
description:
Cross Country is a game about a teen receiving a message that the world is going to be destroyed, and going on a road trip across the country to try to stop it. Made for IGMC 2017.

Credits:

Game - Sliver
Art - Melldere and Xenithiagen
Music - Tamborrino
Soundfonts by Rick Simon
Font by Ed Merritt/Ten by Twenty
Side Battle Script by Dr. Yami
RTP Assets - Degica
Special Thanks to Cobalt and Yoobii
